definition: the opening of a jar or bottle, express in speech
details:
noun
- the opening of a jar or bottle
= example: the opening of a jar or bottle
- the externally visible part of the oral cavity on the face and the system of organs surrounding the opening
= example: the externally visible part of the oral cavity on the face and the system of organs surrounding the opening
- the opening through which food is taken in and vocalizations emerge
= example: the opening through which food is taken in and vocalizations emerge
= synonyms: oral cavity, oral fissure, rima oris
- an impudent or insolent rejoinder
= synonyms: lip
- the point where a stream issues into a larger body of water
= example: the point where a stream issues into a larger body of water
- an opening that resembles a mouth, as of a cave or a gorge
= example: an opening that resembles a mouth, as of a cave or a gorge
- a person conceived as a consumer of food
= example: a person conceived as a consumer of food
- a spokesperson (as a lawyer)
= synonyms: mouthpiece
verb
- express in speech
= synonyms: talk
- articulate silently
- touch with the mouth
